page.title: 05Transport by Sea
page.content:
Q.When is your busiest time of year? A.Without doubt July and August. Q.When is the least busy time of year? A.Just after Christmas, January and February. Q.How many people work for you? A.We have two full time in summer and some people on a casual basis. Q.How much fuel do you use in a year? A.We buy about 8000 gallons of gas oil from Tresco Estate. Q.Who repairs and maintains the boats? A.We do as much as possible ourselves but for the engines we use H.J.Thomas on St.Mary's.
{Mr Stedeford is one of the four {directors of Bryher Boat Services {which provides all the inter island {transport for Bryher and Tresco.
